        public static io.opentelemetry.api.trace.Span startSpan​(String tracerName,
                                                        String spanName)
        Creates a new span with the given tracer and span names, note will return an 'invalid' span if OpenTelementry is turned off.
        Parameters:
        tracerName - Name of the Tracer to use
        spanName - Name of the Span to use.

        new Span
